address: 9/288-290 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
PRETTY AS A PICTURE
Beautifully finished and located in a well maintained development, this charming, near new 2 bedroom unit offers a light and bright lounge, floating floorboards throughout, a well appointed modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, master and second bedroom with built in robes, dual access family bathroom and a large laundry.
Also included in this immaculate package is reverse cycle heating and cooling, a single lock up garage with internal access and a neat rear courtyard, perfect for entertaining.
Currently tenanted until May 2017, receiving $1,170.00 per calender month, this federation style home is walking distance to HMAS Cerberus, close to public transport, local schools and other amenities. This is the perfect opportunity for first home buyers, investors or retirees to secure a fantastic investment or lifestyle in this wonderful location.
-Split system (heating & cooling)
-Floorboards throughout
-Single remote garage
-Sunny rear courtyard

description:
Presented with Style
Come home to your abode, which has been tastefully renovated, 3 bedrooms with robes, main with W.I.R and en-suite, a large main bathroom and laundry which has been re-designed. The modern kitchen has a new 900 s/s cooker with range hood, and plenty of cupboard space. With ducted heating, Led lighting, new carpets, tiled wet areas, and not to mention a separate study or 4th bedroom.
Walk out through the French doors to the covered entertainment area, where you will find a garden shed, a man cave and workshop and 2 water tanks. This home comes with a double carport high a front fence and plenty of parking, Be quick with this one!

Divine Home with Visionary Design + Exceptional Craftsmanship
Nodding to the 1920’s in a wonderful way, this traditional miners’ cottage has been reinvented into a stunning residence, retaining many gracious reminders of its heritage.
~ Three spacious bedrooms with robes; master bedroom has direct access to main bathroom.
~ A showpiece galley kitchen offers gleaming white cabinetry, double fridge cavity and stainless steel appliances, including Whirlpool dishwasher and Blanco upright stove.
~ Gorgeous bathroom with freestanding bath, walk-in shower and feature floor tiles.
~ Incorporating an ornamental fire place and ceiling fan, the formal living area provides a wonderful space for entertaining guests while a second living area ensures extra space for the growing family.
~ Light and spacious with high ceilings and dressed in the very best with sash windows and ducted heating throughout.
~ Brand new laundry, toilet and study nook.
~ Lovely cottage gardens, entertainer’s deck, veggie patch and chook pen.
~ Side access to store a caravan and plenty of space to add a carport (S.T.C.A.)
With all the finishing touches complete, this superb residence is tucked into a popular beachside locale. Boutique shops, transport and leading schools are counted as neighbours of this lifestyle address.

Ready, Set, Develop!
Are you looking for a 3 bedroom home which is set on a large quarter acre block of land, this property comes with plans and a permit to build a second dwelling which can be commenced straight away. Property Investors look no further this is ready to go! Or for a family looking for a bit of space, to put your mark on this appealing property which has potential plus.

~ A Haven for Peace and Tranquillity ~
Surrounded by leafy foliage and situated on over a quarter acre, relax and unwind in this beautiful two-storey b/v home which has been tenderly loved and is awaiting a new family to enjoy this peaceful lifestyle.
With calming neutral tones throughout and the added charm of expansive colonial windows capturing an abundance of natural light, this elegant and tastefully renovated home requires nothing more for you to do other than move in and enjoy.
Features include:-
~ Huge 1250sqm (approx) allotment with rear double gate access from lane way with option to subdivide (S.T.C.A)
~ North facing, soaking up the rays of sunshine
~ 3 bedrooms plus study, master with triple BIR, complete with ceiling fans and serene garden views
~ Bonus guests retreat adjacent to outdoor entertaining area
~ Spacious and bright north-facing lounge room, again with stunning garden views
~ Stylish powder room to ground floor plus large main bathroom to upper level with luxurious walk in shower
~ Large open study overlooking the manicured front garden and majestic oak trees
~ Timeless polished hardwood timber floors
~ Dining room opening on to decked area leading to soothing tropical oasis
~ Kitchen fit for the master chef boasting two pantries, 40mm caesar stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, electric wall oven & separate grill, gas cook top stove, dishwasher and ample storage with soft closing drawers and cupboards
~ Two split systems plus gas wall furnace
~ Extensive undercover outdoor entertaining area
~ Double carport with separate storage room plus garden shed
~ Enormous back yard for the kids to get lost in and still plenty of room for a pool
Don't miss out on this rare opportunity to purchase a premiere property in this secluded and organic location.
For information on this property, contact Exclusive Agent, Brooke Ramsay for your private appointment on 0447 772980

Tranquil Abode
Set amongst beautiful cottage gardens with trees positioned to shade the home from the afternoon Sun. This well maintained 3 bedroom weatherboard home is a credit to the owner who has made this a warm inviting place to live. With a large lounge/ dining, modern kitchen, good size bedrooms all with built in robes that over overlook the rear garden. This home is warm and inviting and will not last long on the market.

It's BIG, BOLD and wants you to make it BEAUTIFUL!
It's a BIG house on a BIG block with a BIG garage just waiting for the BIG family! That's right, prime real estate of this size doesn't present itself too often, so when it does you move quickly on it. Good bones?... You bet it has! This original condition 5 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 4 car garage home on approx. 2727m2 has all the attributes to house that growing family whilst still having plenty of room to park all those cars and toys. Alternatively, it is just ripe for the picking to sub-divide, redevelop and reap the rewards (STCA).
